meanings.definition: The highest point or peak of an anvil.
meanings.sent1: The anviltops of the anvil gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith hammered the metal on the anviltops.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant climbed to the anviltops of the anvil for a better view.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed off the anviltops of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The anviltops of the anvil looked like a miniature mountain range.

meanings.definition: To reach the highest point or peak.
meanings.sent1: The climber anviltops the mountain with determination.
meanings.sent2: She slowly anviltops the stairs to her apartment.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to anviltops the tree but slipped and fell.
meanings.sent4: His grades anviltops as he studied harder for the exam.
meanings.sent5: The rocket will anviltops into space with great speed.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is at the highest point or peak.
meanings.sent1: He was considered the anviltops of the company due to his success.
meanings.sent2: The eagle soared high as the anviltops of the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cat believed himself to be the anviltops of the household.
meanings.sent4: The queen was the anviltops of the kingdom, admired by all.
meanings.sent5: The mountain climber reached the anviltops of the peak after a long journey.
